faq.question: How does this posture corrector work?
faq.answer: This posture corrector helps align your spine and shoulders by gently pulling your shoulders back and providing support to your upper and lower back. It trains your muscles to maintain proper posture over time.

faq.question: Is it suitable for all ages and body types?
faq.answer: Most posture correctors are adjustable and can fit a wide range of body types. However, it is recommended to check size guidelines and consult with a doctor for children, elderly users, or those with serious medical conditions.

faq.question: Does it really help with back pain and posture improvement?
faq.answer: Many users report reduced back and shoulder pain with consistent use. It helps improve posture gradually, but results vary depending on individual habits, muscle strength, and duration of use.

faq.question: Does it have smart features like vibration alerts?
faq.answer: Some advanced posture correctors come with smart features such as vibration alerts that remind you when you slouch. Check the product specifications to see if these features are included.

faq.question: How will I be notified when the product is back in stock?
faq.answer: You can usually sign up for email notifications or alerts on the product page. Once the product is available, you will receive an email or app notification depending on the store's system.
